title: Mini’s new Convertible features a built-in app that tells you when a storm is coming
text:
Mini’s new Convertible features a built-in app that tells you when a storm is coming 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
MINI will introduce the new 2017 Convertible at the Tokyo Motor Show. It boasts a clever rain warning application that warns the driver if a...
